events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred yesterday afternoon and filed a claim for damages to the rear bumper and tail lights.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision and resulting damages.
An agent was assigned to the case promptly to handle all communications and assist the customer throughout the claim process.
Official acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer, including details of next steps and required documentation.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report to support the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photographs and the official police report pertaining to the accident.
An investigation into the accident circumstances began, reviewing submitted evidence and contacting involved parties for statements.
Investigation concluded, confirming the liability and extent of damage to the vehicle, enabling proceeding to settlement.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer covering all repair costs and associated expenses.
The customer provided positive feedback expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and claim handling.
The claim was formally approved by the insurance company following customer acceptance of the settlement terms.
The settlement payment was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover repairs and other damages.
The claim case was officially closed after the successful payment and resolution of all claim activities.
The claim documents and case files were archived securely for future reference in the insurance database.
